6. Citation¶

If you use this package, please cite us:

Sánchez-García, D., Bienvenido-Huertas, D., Rubio-Bellido, C., 2021. Computational approach to extend the air-conditioning usage to adaptive comfort: Adaptive-Comfort-Control-Implementation Script. Automation in Construction. 131, 103900. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.autcon.2021.103900

Sánchez-García, D., Martínez-Crespo, J., Hernando, U.R.R., Alonso, C., 2023. A detailed view of the Adaptive-Comfort-Control-Implementation Script (ACCIS): The capabilities of the automation system for adaptive setpoint temperatures in building energy models. Energy and Buildings. 288. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.enbuild.2023.113019
